document_data.mainbody:
even Songs Importing was a shop in Athkatlas rich Temple District in the 14 century DR.
Seven Songs Importing stood across from the famed Crown Aflame theater of Athkatla on the crossing of the Street of Seven Altars, Oblade Street, and Aundles Walk. The shops next-door neighbor to the west was the home of Marimmal Theer, an actor and musician of the late 14 century DR.
The shop dealt in little physical goods, instead, it procured a variety of rare and exotic goods to order.
